description: Input schema for batch Maya-1-Voice TTS generation

top_p.title: Top P
top_p.description: Nucleus sampling parameter for all generations.

output_format.description: Output audio format for all generated speech files
output_format.title: Output Format

texts.description: List of texts to synthesize into speech. You can embed emotion tags in each text using the format <emotion_name>.
texts.title: Texts

prompts.description: List of voice descriptions for each text. Must match the length of texts list. Each describes the voice/character attributes.
prompts.title: Prompts

sample_rate.description: Output audio sample rate for all generations. 48 kHz provides higher quality, 24 kHz is faster.
sample_rate.title: Sample Rate

title: MayaVoiceBatchInput
